turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to make an order from Peet's Coffee espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Hold on 1 second.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a golden caffe latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have some whipped cream on top? That'd be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a golden cafe latte, with whole milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I pick it up at the Pits on Main Street and Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the peet's on main st.
